title: ChaosMonkeyShardSplitTest does not actually kill the overseer
description: ChaosMonkeyShardSplitTest does not actually kill the overseer so it is not very useful in testing splits in failure scenarios.

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content: I'm going to disable this test until we fix it. Both ShardSplitTest and this test fail for the same reason but this test is not adding value over the ShardSplitTest.

comments.content: Why doesn't it kill the overseer yet? Sounds like a great test scenario to have

comments.content: Absolutely, I'll take a stab at it.
